  I wrote an article for Yahoo that has to do with Japanese and Chinese his=
tory. It focuses on Chinese films and propaganda. The moral of the article =
is I suppose, that it's time to give the Japanese a break concerning what h=
appened in 1937 in Nanjing. No nation has a perfect history.
 I hope you do=
n't find it too opinionated.
